summary: Makes Auriel's Bow less sucky without making it game breakingly powerful.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Better Auriels Bow
Version: 1.0
Date: 08/13/2012
Author: popcorn71


[heading][color=red]Requires[/color][/heading]Dawnguard


[heading][color=green]Details[/color][/heading]For a so called legendary weapon of the gods Auriel's Bow really wasn't all that great. This is just a small plugin to boost its usefulness while (hopefully) not making it game breakingly powerful.

Changes to Auriel's Bow are as fallows:
Weight is now equivalent to that of an Elven Bow, while damage has been set to that of a Daedric Bow. Value has been quadrupled to 4000.

I have also alter the enchantment on Auriel's Bow to have infinite charges.

Changes to Sunhallowed/Bloodcursed Elven Arrow are as fallows:
Boosted damage to equal that of Daedric Arrow.


[heading][color=green]Install[/color][/heading][list=1][*]Extract 'Better Auriels Bow.esp' into you Skyrim data folder.
[*]Start the Skyrim Launcher and place a check mark next to 'Better Auriels Bow.esp'.
[*]Have fun playing Skyrim.
[/list]

[heading][color=green]Uninstall[/color][/heading]Delete 'Better Auriels Bow.esp' from your data folder.


[heading][color=red]Incompatibility[/color][/heading]Mods that make changes to Auriel's Bow.
Mods that make changes to Sunhallowed/Bloodcursed Elven Arrow. If you use a mod that does this, you should load it [b]after[/b] [u]Better Auriels Bow.esp[/u].


[heading][color=red]Known Issues or Bugs[/color][/heading]None known


[heading][color=green]Contact[/color][/heading]The best way to reach me is by PM on the Nexus.
I also check the comments section regularly, so chances are good I will see and respond to feedback
as needed in a few days.


[heading][color=green]Tools Used[/color][/heading]Creation Kit
